amendatorysection.catchline: Attachment; several orders against same defendant; time of service.
amendatorysection.para: When there are several orders of attachment against the same defendant, they shall be executed in the order in which they are received by the sheriff.

annotation.para: First levy has priority. Moore v. Fedewa, 13 Neb. 379, 14 N.W. 170 (1882).
